title: Ménage à 20, Tales with a hook
description: Get Hooked --San Diego Dispatch An orgy of many-splendored prose --Pocatello Times Life, death, demons, and donuts. The perils of love; the perils of hell. Ghosts, TV, and human sacrifice. What do they all share? A group of writers, published and unpublished, with no other goal but to make you gasp in shock. Thirty stories, twenty writers. Prepare to get hooked.
author: Carlos J. Cortes
